pages.title: NASA Workbench
pages.text: In order to build a rocket, you must first collect all of the parts: cone, plates, fins, tanks and engine. You can then make the rocket in a NASA workbench, a specially designed workbench just for rockets.
To place your newly-created rocket, you must build a launchpad.

pages.title: Launchpad
pages.text: After the launch pad has been built, place the rocket in the center. If you want, you can power any part of the launch pad to automatically launch the rocket once fueled.
